summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to grade to proper elevation all of Block "O" of the Plat of the Town of Seattle, as laid out on the claims of C. D. Boren and A. A. Denny, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
